name: Seismic Software
tag_list: enterprise-software, powerpoint, mobile-presentations, cloud-software, ipad-presentations, ipad-documents
overview:
Seismic is the enterprise app that accesses a cloud-based library of your company’s brand collateral and business materials — all backed by a live data feed — to generate meaningful, integrated content on demand.

It’s the single place where all your brand-approved materials are up to date and accessible to anyone on their desktops at the office or on their tablets in the field.

Seismic is not your typical enterprise software. It is built for the Mobile Cloud world with a simple user interface and an elegant user experience. The power of enterprise software with the ease of use of consumer apps.

Secure Sleep easy — your information is safe. Seismic uses a redundant cloud environment along with a host of other stringent security measures to ensure that every user interaction, every piece of content and every bit of data is safe and secure.

Integrated Where are those numbers? Now they’re right where they need to be — at your fingertips. Seamlessly melding Microsoft Office, Salesforce and other tools with updates from Morningstar, S&P Capital IQ and other real-time data systems, suddenly all those piles of raw data turn into rich, compelling information. Information that’s on brand and on point.

Customized And Relevant Take approved marketing materials straight from Marketing and make them even more relevant with personalized text and customized facts and figures. Make sure more than just names and dates change on your materials. Select the most appropriate content based on demographic data. Include personal data in charts and tables. Tailor the message or format to fit each and every situation. With everything from interest rates to market trends constantly being auto-updated, your “theoretically” is now as accurate as projections get.
